info.title: Reward Loyalty API
info.description: This API provides endpoints for the various users of the Reward Loyalty script.

post.description: Allows an administrator or manager to authenticate using their email and password.
Revokes all access tokens for the authenticated administrator or manager.

get.summary: Retrieve authenticated administrator or manager data
get.description: Fetches data of the authenticated administrator or manager.

get.summary: Retrieve accessible partners to which the authenticated administrator has access
get.description: Allows the authenticated administrator to fetch a list of partners they have access to.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific partner's details to which the authenticated administrator has access
get.description: Allows the authenticated administrator to fetch details of a specific partner by its ID.

parameters.name: partnerId
parameters.description: ID of the partner to fetch

put.summary: Update a specific partner by ID to which the authenticated administrator has access
put.description: Allows the authenticated administrator to update details of a specific partner by its ID.

parameters.name: partnerId
parameters.description: ID of the partner to update

post.description: Allows a new member to create an account by providing necessary details.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the member, if empty a password is generated

parameters.name: time_zone
parameters.description: The time zone of the member

parameters.name: accepts_emails
parameters.description: Whether the member accepts marketing emails from a partner or not

parameters.name: send_mail
parameters.description: Whether to send an email with the password to the newly created member

post.description: Authenticates a member using their email and password.
Revokes all access tokens for the authenticated member, effectively logging them out.

get.description: Fetches the data of the authenticated member.

get.summary: Retrieve all cards followed and transacted by the member
get.description: Retrieve all cards that the authenticated member follows and has transacted with.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the array of followed and transacted cards

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

get.summary: Retrieve all active cards followed by the member
get.description: Retrieve all active cards that the authenticated member follows.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the array of followed cards

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

get.summary: Retrieve all active cards transacted by the member
get.description: Retrieve all active cards that the authenticated member has transacted with.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the array of cards with member's transactions

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

get.summary: Retrieve member's balance for a specific card
get.description: Retrieve the balance of the authenticated member for a specific card.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the member's balance for the specific card

balance.description: The member's balance for the specific card

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

post.summary: Authenticate and log in a partner
post.description: Authenticate a partner using their email and password and log them in.
Revoke all access tokens for the authenticated partner and log them out.

get.description: Retrieve the data of the authenticated partner.

get.summary: Retrieve all active cards for the authenticated partner
get.description: Retrieve all active cards associated with the authenticated partner where the associated club is also active.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific active card for the authenticated partner
get.description: Retrieve a specific active card by its ID associated with the authenticated partner.

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to be retrieved

get.summary: Retrieve all active clubs for the authenticated partner
get.description: Retrieve all active clubs associated with the authenticated partner where the associated club is also active.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific active club for the authenticated partner by its ID
get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific active club identified by the clubId where the authenticated partner has access to.

put.description: Update the details of the authenticated.

requestBody.description: Provide the partner data you wish to update. Omit any key/value pairs that should remain unchanged.

get.summary: Retrieve all active staff members of the authenticated partner
get.description: Fetch all active staff members where the authenticated partner has access to and the associated club is also active.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific staff member's details of the authenticated partner
get.description: Fetch the details of a specific active staff member where the authenticated partner has access to and the associated club is also active.

post.summary: Add a purchase to a card
post.description: Add a new purchase transaction to a card where the authenticated partner has access to.

parameters.name: cardUID
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to which the transaction will be added

purchase_amount.description: The amount of money spent on the purchase

image.description: The image associated with the transaction

note.description: An optional note for the purchase

post.description: Add new points to a card where the authenticated partner has access to.

parameters.name: cardUID
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to which the transaction will be added

points.description: The number of points to add

image.description: The image associated with the transaction

note.description: An optional note for the points addition

UnauthenticatedResponse.description: Response structure when user is unauthenticated

NotFoundResponse.description: Response structure when resource is not found

example: The email must be a valid email address.

AdminLoginSuccess.description: Response structure when admin login is successful

role.description: Role of the admin (1 = Admin, 2 = Manager)

number_of_times_logged_in.description: Number of times the admin has logged in

last_login_at.description: Last login timestamp of the admin

created_at.description: Creation timestamp of the admin record

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the admin record

network_id.description: Network ID associated with the partner

email_verified_at.description: Timestamp when the email was verified

is_active.description: Indicates if the partner is active

number_of_times_logged_in.description: Number of times the partner has logged in

last_login_at.description: Last login timestamp of the partner

created_at.description: Creation timestamp of the partner record

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the partner record

token.description: Generated authentication token for the partner

network_id.description: Network ID associated with the partner

email_verified_at.description: Timestamp when the email was verified

number_of_times_logged_in.description: Number of times the partner has logged in

last_login_at.description: Last login timestamp of the partner

created_at.description: Creation timestamp of the partner record

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the partner record

token.description: Generated authentication token for the member

accepts_emails.description: Indicates if the member accepts emails

send_mail.description: If set to 1, sends an email with the password to the newly registered member

email_verified_at.description: Timestamp when the email was verified

accepts_emails.description: Indicates if the member accepts emails

number_of_times_logged_in.description: Number of times the member has logged in

last_login_at.description: Last login timestamp of the member

created_at.description: Creation timestamp of the member record

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the member record

created_at.description: Creation timestamp of the club record

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the club record

club_id.description: Unique identifier for the Club associated with the Card

fr_FR.example: Soignez vos choix et soyez récompensé(e) !

bg_color_opacity.description: Background color opacity of the Card

text_label_color.description: Text label color of the Card

qr_color_light.description: QR code light color of the Card

qr_color_dark.description: QR code dark color of the Card

initial_bonus_points.description: Initial bonus points of the Card

points_expiration_months.description: Number of months after which the points on the Card expire

currency_unit_amount.description: Currency unit amount of the Card

points_per_currency.description: Number of points earned per currency unit spent using the Card

min_points_per_purchase.description: Minimum points that can be earned per purchase using the Card

max_points_per_purchase.description: Maximum points that can be earned per purchase using the Card

is_visible_by_default.description: Indicates if the Card is visible by default (1 for true, 0 for false)

is_visible_when_logged_in.description: Indicates if the Card is visible when a user is logged in (1 for true, 0 for false)

total_amount_purchased.description: Total amount purchased using the Card

number_of_points_issued.description: Total number of points issued for the Card

last_points_issued_at.description: Last time points were issued for the Card

number_of_points_redeemed.description: Total number of points redeemed from the Card

number_of_rewards_redeemed.description: Total number of rewards redeemed using the Card

last_reward_redeemed_at.description: Last time a reward was redeemed using the Card

views.description: Number of times the Card was viewed

last_view.description: Last time the Card was viewed

meta.description: Additional metadata associated with the Card in JSON format

updated_at.description: Last update timestamp of the Card

balance.description: The member's balance. This field has a value of 0 or higher for API calls where a member is authenticated. If the balance is not applicable or unavailable, its value is -1.

id.description: The unique identifier of the staff member

club_id.description: The unique identifier of the club associated with the staff member

name.description: The name of the staff member

email.description: The email address of the staff member

time_zone.description: The time zone of the staff member

number_of_times_logged_in.description: The number of times the staff member has logged in

last_login_at.description: The timestamp of the staff member's last login

created_at.description: The timestamp of when the staff member was created

updated_at.description: The timestamp of the last update of the staff member's details

avatar.description: The URL to the avatar image of the staff member

purchase_amount.description: The amount of money that was spent on the purchase.

note.description: An optional note that can be added to the purchase.

staff_id.description: The unique identifier of the staff member who created the transaction

member_id.description: The unique identifier of the member who made the purchase

card_id.description: The unique identifier of the card that was used for the purchase

purchase_amount.description: The amount of money that was spent on the purchase

note.description: An optional note that can be added to the purchase

points_issued.description: The number of points issued for the purchase

reward_redeemed.description: Indicates whether a reward was redeemed for the purchase

reward_id.description: The unique identifier of the reward that was redeemed

created_at.description: The timestamp of when the transaction was created

tags.name: Admin
tags.description: Operations related to Admininstrators and Managers
